General.Name: Kriti Nutrients Limited
General.Description: Kriti Nutrients Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of soyabean seeds under the Kriti brand in India and internationally. It offers edible oils, such as refined sunflower oil, soya bean oil, filtered groundnut oil, and mustard oil; soya lecithin; protein-based nuggets/TVP, full fat soya flour, defatted flakes/ grits/ flour toasted, defatted flakes/ grits/ flour untoasted, super HyPro SBM, and soya hulls; and acid oil and fatty acids. The company serves food, pharmaceutical, aquaculture and poultry, and dairy industries. It also exports its products. Kriti Nutrients Limited was founded in 1992 and is based in Indore, India. Kriti Nutrients Limited is a subsidiary of Sakam Trading Private Limited.

0.Name: Mr. Shiv Singh Mehta B.E., MBA
